meanings.sent1: The storm grew even intenser as the winds howled louder.
meanings.sent2: The movie's climax became even intenser with each passing minute.
meanings.sent3: The intenser music made the dance party even more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze became intenser as she focused on the intricate details of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The intenser flavors of the spicy dish left a lasting impression on his taste buds.

meanings.sent1: The heatwave made the summer days even intenser than last year.
meanings.sent2: The competition this year was intenser than any previous years.
meanings.sent3: The intenser traffic jam caused delays for everyone on the road.
meanings.sent4: His fear of heights grew even intenser as he climbed higher up the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The intenser workload required extra effort from the team to meet the deadline.
